reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 24/01: FORMS - SECTION 197 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 24/01: FORMS - SECTION 197 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Protection Act   Loi sur la protection de l’environnement

content.content: 1. (1) A certificate under subsection 197 (2) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister under clause 23.1 (1) (a) of the Interpretation Act. O. Reg. 24/01, s. 1 (1). (2) A certificate under subsection 197 (5) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister under clause 23.1 (1) (a) of the Interpretation Act. O. Reg. 24/01, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A certificate under subsection 197 (2) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister under clause 23.1 (1) (a) of the Interpretation Act. O. Reg. 24/01, s. 1 (1).

(2) A certificate under subsection 197 (5) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister under clause 23.1 (1) (a) of the Interpretation Act. O. Reg. 24/01, s. 1 (2).
